mapper.sql: sets.electronic_tag_storage_id, sets.storage_id, sets.electronic_tag_controller_id, sets.electronic_tag_id, sets.`status`, sets.create_user_id, sets.create_time, sets.modified_user_id, sets.modified_time, sets.is_delete, sets.option1, sets.option2, sets.option3
mapper.select:
SELECT, su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, ss.storage_name AS storage_name, ss.storage_desc AS storage_desc, setc.electronic_tag_controller_name AS electronic_tag_controller_name, setc.electronic_tag_controller_ip AS electronic_tag_controller_ip, setc.electronic_tag_controller_port AS electronic_tag_controller_port, sw.warehouse_name AS warehouse_name, swa.warehouse_area_name AS warehouse_area_name FROM smt_electronic_tag_storage sets LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON sets.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON sets.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN smt_storage ss ON sets.storage_id = ss.storage_id LEFT JOIN smt_electronic_tag_controller setc ON sets.electronic_tag_controller_id = setc.electronic_tag_controller_id LEFT JOIN smt_warehouse sw ON ss.warehouse_id = sw.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN smt_warehouse_area swa ON ss.warehouse_area_id = swa.warehouse_area_id
and date_format(sets.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and ss.storage_name like CONCAT('%', #{storageName}, '%')
and sw.warehouse_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseName}, '%')
and swa.warehouse_area_name like CONCAT('%', #{warehouseAreaName}, '%')
and setc.electronic_tag_controller_name like CONCAT('%', #{electronicTagControllerName}, '%')
and setc.electronic_tag_controller_ip like CONCAT('%', #{electronicTagControllerIp}, '%')
and sets.electronic_tag_id like CONCAT('%', #{electronicTagId}, '%')
and sets.status=#{status}
order by sets.create_time desc
